data.message: Idea:  Allow us to rate and or review a movie page and or video-game page, so when a user looks up a movie/game page on facebook it can show the general consensus about that movie or game.  In similar fashion to meta-critic or imdb.  Just throwing the idea out there :)

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Spencer! We listen to all the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have any more suggestions, we'd love to hear from you: http://on.fb.me/1Qy4WJu. -Jordan
